attributes.action: To Tell the  government and cofe to allow open aired drive-in worship on fields.
attributes.additional_details: Because there no guidance they closed our churches and temples and other places we want permission to open fields and do distance worship no church needs to open just. Let us do our thing
attributes.background: We want the government to allow church's to do open aire worship. To give guidance on doing so. Idea is to drive on field and church can worship in there cars together. Church needs to be able to worship.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced that places of worship can reopen, and has published guidance for the safe use of places of worship and special religious services and gatherings during the pandemic, including arrangements for outdoor worship: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-guidance-for-the-safe-use-of-places-of-worship-during-the-pandemic-from-4-july
